TopicTitle: Simple suggestion - Mission Report (F3 button) shows science collected on mission so far

Articles.Content:
F3 button shows mission log and some stats like mission time, distance travelled etc.

It would be helpful if, in career mode and science mode, it also showed:

1) Science collected and kept/stored awaiting recovery or transmission

2) Science collected and transmitted (perhaps both the base amount and the amount after transmission penalty).

It would be pretty cool to see how much your probe has scooped up whilst hurtling through the kerbol system or how much little Jeb on his rover has discovered on a trip to the Munar pole.
